# identifier

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for a data item provided by the associated JSON object.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute String identifier;
```

## Discussion

The `identifier` property is mapped to the [link-2902592] attribute when the data item is converted to a DOM element. The underlying JSON objects being mapped must have a unique identifier for all JSON objects grouped under the same type.

## Retrieving Data Item Information

- **type**: The type for a data item provided by the associated JSON object.
